title: FIDM (fashion institute of design & merchandising) slab serif font
content:
I was wondering if anyone could identify the slab serif used for the FIDM logo.

Thanks in advance.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [FIDM.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150328042321/http:/typophile.com/files/FIDM.png) | 9.12 KB |
author: topomodesto

comments.content: I am fairly confident that it is [theSerif](http://web.archive.org/web/20150328042321/http:/www.lucasfonts.com/fonts/theserif/) by Luc(as) de groot.
